page.title: 01Health
page.content: The{practice}has been open for 6 years, and it was started by{Dr. Begg and{Dr. Cabnon. }The Drs. go as far as Avebury to visit people who are unable to get to the{practice. }Altgether there are 9383 patients in the whole area, there are 6000 in Wroughton, 3000 in Chiseldon and 383 that are spread out over the countryside. In the{practise}there are 5 Drs. in the {practice}and 1 trainee Dr.The trainee Dr. spend 6_7 years training before they can be a qualified Dr. There is a practice manager and 16 other employees.Each Dr.visits 3 patients a day in there homes and then they spend 2 hours in the surgery and roughly every 7 minutes they see a new patient.At 11 o' clock till 12 o'clock it is for emergencies only and then
